import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import WeatherData from '../WeatherLocation/WeatherData' const data = { temperature: 10, weatherState: 'normal', humidity: 10, wind: 'normal' } const ForecastItem = ({ weekDay, hour }) => (
{weekDay}, Hora: {hour} hrs.
) ForecastItem.propTypes = { weekDay: PropTypes.string.isRequired, hour: PropTypes.number.isRequired, } export default ForecastItem
